primary.context: Caller claims ownership was transferred to ex-wife during divorce but still receives invoices.
primary.detail: The AI verified the caller, confirmed the current ownership record, and correctly transferred the caller to the concierge department to handle the ownership dispute.

steps: Agent performed account lookup via phone number.
Agent verified caller name and state.
Caller explained the ownership should have been transferred to his ex-wife.
Agent checked contract details and confirmed the caller is still the listed owner.
Agent offered and executed a transfer to a specialist to resolve the ownership issue.

actions.detail: Found record using caller's phone number.
Verified name spelling and state of residence.
Transferred to concierge for ownership dispute.

insights.summary: The caller wanted to know why he was still receiving maintenance invoices after a divorce transfer; the AI confirmed he was still the owner of record and transferred him to concierge.
insights.verbatim: Last year, I divorced my wife, and this was transferred into her name. So I don't know why I'm getting an invoice.
